data.title: The Upside-Down Medicine by HELPS, Racey: Good Soft Cover (1946)
data.meta_description: Soft Cover - Collins - 1946 - Condition: Good - Uncommon title in the Barnaby Littlemouse series. Pictoral finished card covers with black and red lettering to front. Boards are rather worn but still serviceable. Corners are bumped, edges are worn. Spine is holding well but the paper covering has all been lost. Some slight fox to the endpages. Textblock has one or two grubby marks but is generally clean. Childish scribble to the edge of p15 and a drawing to the final blank. 48 pp. Additional photos are available upon request. When securely packed this item will weigh in the region of 278g. All our books are photographed so you can see what you are buying. ABE may, however, display a stock image whilst processing ours. (YBP Ref: 030168:5e) Size: 24mo - over 5" - 53/4" tall 278 G - The Upside-Down Medicine
data.text:
About this Item

Uncommon title in the Barnaby Littlemouse series. Pictoral finished card covers with black and red lettering to front. Boards are rather worn but still serviceable. Corners are bumped, edges are worn. Spine is holding well but the paper covering has all been lost. Some slight fox to the endpages. Textblock has one or two grubby marks but is generally clean. Childish scribble to the edge of p15 and a drawing to the final blank. 48 pp. Additional photos are available upon request. When securely packed this item will weigh in the region of 278g. All our books are photographed so you can see what you are buying. ABE may, however, display a stock image whilst processing ours. (YBP Ref: 030168:5e) Size: 24mo - over 5" - 53/4" tall 278 G. Seller Inventory # 030168

Contact seller

Report this item

Yatton Book Shop is a bookshop in the real world with an on-line presence. We are PBFA members and exhibit regularly at PBFA book fairs. We specialise in military history, aviation, naval and also have a good general stock. We are also a real book shop in the real world - our shop (open Saturday 10 - 12) is at 69a High Street, Yatton, BS49 4EQ, next to the Post Office

Visit Seller's Storefront

Association Member Members of these associations are committed to maintaining the highest standards. They vouch for the authenticity of all items offered for sale. They provide expert and detailed descriptions, disclose all significant defects and/or restorations, provide clear and accurate pricing, and operate with fairness and honesty during the purchase experience.

Seller's business information

Ambulavi Ltd t/a Yatton Books & Prints

46 High Street, Yatton, Bristol, BS49 4HJ, United Kingdom

Terms of Sale:

Every effort is made to accurately describe books. All books are checked before despatch. Photos available on request - questions always welcome.

Yatton Books & Prints, a wholly owned subsidiary of Ambulavi Ltd.

46 High St, Yatton, Somerset, BS49 4HJ. Tel 01934 838870.

Antony Wakeford, E-mail sales@yattonbookshop.co.uk

Registered in England. Registered Office: 46 High Street, Yatton, Somerset, BS49 4HJ, UK.

VAT Registration 341606915GB. Company Registration Number: 012402015.

Shipping Terms:

Orders usually shipped within 2 business days. Shipping costs typically based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required. International (non UK) Orders: postage will be charged at cost. If your book is light, postage will be reduced during order acceptance.
